FuncDef:
The mpls te auto-frr command enables the Auto FRR function globally.
The undo mpls te auto-frr command disables the Auto FRR function globally.
By default, auto FRR is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables the dynamic adaptation in Auto FRR.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If MPLS TE Auto FRR is enabled globally, the mpls te auto-frr default command is automatically configured by default on every MPLS TE-enabled interface of the local node. To disable Auto FRR on some interfaces, run the mpls te auto-frr block command on these interfaces.
To enable an automatic bypass tunnel to dynamically select the node protection or link protection based on network conditions, configure self-adapting. If self-adapting is not specified, the Auto bypass tunnel selects node protection.
